This script reads in earthquake data from the Los Angeles region over the time interval from January 1, 1950 to January 29, 2020.  The user is then prompted for their location and the local earthquake data is shown in a 10 mile and 20 mile radius.  The average number of days between earthquakes and the number of earthquakes per year are also plotted for a 20 mile radius about the users location.Files:eq_data.csvLA Coast.csveq_risk.py
